markdownRemark.html:
How to evaluate your startup idea

How do you present your idea to a founder?

Describe your company in 50 characters or less.

What is your company going to make?

Be clear! A clear idea is a foundation of growth. The best founders grow organically and by word of mouth. How to make things easy to uunderstand:

  • legible

    • ideas can be understood by people who have no idea about your business
    • avoid ambiguity =
  • simple
  • obvious
